tooltip.paraglider.heart_container.1: Aumenta en %s el número de corazones, hasta %s veces.
tooltip.paraglider.stamina_vessel.1: Aumenta en %s el límite de tu resistencia, hasta %s veces.
tooltip.paraglider.anti_vessel.0: Recupera todos los contenedor de corazón y de vigor consumidos.
advancement.paraglider.pray_to_the_godde: Cambia 4 símbolos de valía por algo bueno
advancement.paraglider.all_vessels.desc: Consigue la cantidad máxima de contenedores de corazón y de vigor
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.initial.0: Tú que has superado las pruebas y obtenido §bsímbolos de valía§r...
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.initial.1: Te concederé el poder que anheles.
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.success.0: Te concederé el poder que anhelas.
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.failure.no: You do not yet have enough §bSpirit Orbs§r.
Seek out the §bSpirit Orbs§r scattered across the world, and face more challenges.
Once you have claimed enough §bSpirit Orbs§r, return to me.
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.failure.fu: Increasing your power any further may destroy you.
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.failure.he: Your being overflows with life force.
There is no need to increase your §bHeart Containers§r further.
bargain.dialog.goddess_statue.failure.st: There is no need to increase your §bStamina Wheel§r further.
bargain.dialog.horned_statue.success.con: I'll gladly pay for your §bHeart Containers§r.
I wouldn't object if you wanted to give me more §bHeart Containers§r.
I'll gladly pay for your §bStamina Vessels§r.
I wouldn't object if you wanted to give me more §bStamina Vessels§r.
bargain.dialog.horned_statue.failure.not: I know from swindles, boy, and I can plainly tell that you don't have the money required.
No puedes ofrecerme ningún §bcontenedor de corazon§r más.
Careful... Give away any more of your §bHeart Containers§r, and it could have a fatal effect on your health.
No puedes ofrecerme ningún §bcontenedor de vigor§r más.
Have a care... Give me any more of your §bStamina Vessels§r, and you may not have the strength to stand.
En estos momentos no poseo ningún §bcontenedor§r tuyo.
First you must sell me either type of §cessence§r.
bargain.dialog.horned_statue.failure.hea: No, no... I'm afraid you already have all the §bHeart Containers§r you possibly can.
bargain.dialog.horned_statue.failure.sta: No, no... I'm afraid you already have all the §bStamina Vessels§r you possibly can.
bargain.dialog.horned_statue.failure.ess: You can't sell any more of your vessels. Consider getting a life.
